title: Putting Flowers in wedding for bride & groom is it allowed
transcript: rocky says what's the ruling on garling ding I think she called it which is putting flowers at the bride and the groom when they get married if this is something related to the customs and the Muslims all of them do it there is no problem in that it is permissible as long as there is no mixing between the genders and it's only for women alone or four men alone there is no problem in sha Allah but if it is a Hindu practice and this is related to their religion it is totally prohibited for Muslims and Allah social knows best up
